app.title: GIO: AI Headshot Generator
app.description:
Go for GIO, your pocket-sized AI photo studio! Generate professional headshots, try new outfits, swap backgrounds, and more—in seconds!
Your best headshot is a tap away—save time and money you spend on booking studios!
Whether you're a workspace professional aiming for that perfect LinkedIn profile, a connection seeker wanting to shine on dating apps, or anyone in between seeking to elevate their digital image, GIO is the app for you. We harness the power of gen AI to deliver professional, studio-quality headshots without the need to hire a pro.

What we’ve got:
► Photorealistic portraits: Get a perfect shot in a totally new style with the power of our AI: submit one photo that needs an upgrade and receive an impressive new one, generated by our img2img technologies; 
► Outfit generator: No need for a wardrobe change; our outfit creator instantly updates your look in the picture. Explore a variety of style possibilities and always have the perfect one for your photo, no matter the occasion;
► Сatalog of styles: Flip through our Discover page: the wide-ranging and carefully curated showcase of tasteful ways in which we can alter your photos. And yes—there are always more styles coming! 
► Intuitive editing UI: Easily achieve crisp photo quality every time with our friendly interface: apply any style to your picture in mere taps for a foolproof sophisticated result!

GIO is more than just a pro photo studio in your pocket; it's a gateway to your best digital self. With our AI photo enhancer and background remover, every photo is a step towards perfection. From professional headshots to profile pictures and outfit swaps, we’ve got you covered with our AI effects.

If you’d like to learn more, here are a couple of links:
Our Terms of Use are here: https://gioapp.ai/term-of-use/
Our Privacy Policy’s here: https://gioapp.ai/privacy-policy/

Got a feature idea that could make GIO even better? We'd love to hear from you! Send your suggestions to support@gioapp.ai and help shape the future of your favorite editing app.

app.summary: Realistic Photo Studio for Business Headshots. Hair profile stylist & photoshoot

reviews.text: The creation of my AI photo took forever. When I attempted to use a different photo, even though the app stated that my first was looked good, it still took forever to generate. I am still waiting as I type this review, and it's been 5+ minutes. Also, when I checked my first photo, the "suit" you applied looked so tacky, baggy, and looked like it was drawn on. It's really poor quality for an app that requires you to 7.99 just to see what you're getting into. I definitely want my money back.
reviews.replyText: Hello! We're sorry for the disappointing experience with Gio. We'd like to investigate the issues properly, but we'd need more details about them. Could you please send us a message from the app’s settings menu -> Help -> Send feedback. You may also attach some screenshots or records illustrating the issues. Thank you!

reviews.text: I downloaded this app solely for the option to create AI videos as advertised, only to find out that #1, I had to pay for the app- okay no problem- PAID, but #2, in order to make AI videos you have to pay an additional $1.99/video! Very misleading! Not to mention, the AI photos generated were subpar at best. I could have used the background remover that's pre-installed on my smartphone for free to do what this app is charging for! Very disappointed 😞
reviews.replyText: Hi! Subscription is not required for video edits. You can purchase videos only, as one-time payments, separately from all other tools. Could you please provide us with some before&after examples at support@gioapp.ai or from the app's Settings -> Help -> Send feedback? It would be really helpful for future improvements of the app.

reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars and changed it to 2. I LOVE what the app does!! But it constantly has "something went wrong" errors and says to "please try again" but something goes wrong again. I want to keep using this app, but I'm getting tired of uninstalling and reinstalling just for it to work once or twice and crash again. I've also sent several messages and reports but get nothing. I paid for a week. If it's not going to work, I want my money back. 😕😡 JUST FIX IT!!
reviews.replyText: Hello! We would like to investigate the problem, but we need more details about it. Maybe you can contact us through the app configuration menu or in support@gioapp.ai? We will do everything we can to resolve this and improve your Gio experience.

reviews.text: I paid for a yearly subscription. After submitting a couple of headshots I get an error message telling me I've reached the maximum for the week and takes me to a payment screen where I can select other add-on packages to keep working on my headshots. Really? You pay a yearly subscription to only then be limited on usage? I then try and change some of the styles, clothing options, etc. BAM! Another error message telling me I've used up edits, try again in six hrs! I cancelled! Don't waste your $

Don't waste your time or money. The app is buggy and unreliable. Fortunately, I only paid by the week, rather than the year. Only 2 pics out of the "photo shoot" were usable and after a few days, I wasn't even able to to access those, even though I had paid for them and was still paying for premium access. I reached out to customer support twice & the only response I received was the auto-reply, saying they would get back to me "shortly." Ten days later and nothing. This is not an app you want.
reviews.replyText: Hi! Don't forget to check Spam folder for our replies. Could you please provide us with some before&after examples at support@gioapp.ai or from the app's Settings -> Help -> Send feedback? The images are not made by humans but automatically generated by a computer algorithm, so they can contain parts that humans consider as mistakes.

reviews.text: Does not do what's advertised. Just another app that adds some other hair color and style to your face. No ability to control this. I only wanted to turn a casual photo into a business photo and instead had some hair style and hair color that were not mine applied to my pic. I needed pictures that still looked like me. Also def not ai, more like a worse version of FaceTune that has less options.
reviews.replyText:
Hello!
Could you please provide us with some before&after examples at support@gioapp.ai or from the app's Settings -> Help -> Send feedback? It would be really helpful for future improvements of the app. Gio is a very young product, and we are working hard everyday to make it better.

reviews.text: Worthless, my photo isn't even me anymore. I took a quick selfie to test it out as I need a headshot for work. Can't even test it without paying! Paid for it, chose my first picture and they used someone else's picture! That is not me. Tried 3more, 2 of them it kept my face the same, but made my hair look gross, the last one it used someone else's picture again. What a waste, I want a refund.
reviews.replyText: Sorry for the inconveniences! The hair issues are known and we're working to fix them as soon as possible. Also, we would be grateful, if you could share some before&after examples with us. Users’ examples help us a lot to improve the product. You may contact us from Gio Settings menu> Help>Send feedback. Refunds can be requested via Google Play.

reviews.text: Not a great app. I already paid for subscription, but I need to pay more to generate a photo? This is literally what I already paid for! The only feature that is included in the subscription is a poor remake of an existing photo. Couldn't use even one of the many photos I tried remaking. I want my money back.
reviews.replyText: Hi! There are Styles and AI Studio sections. Styles are included into subscription plans. AI Studio is not included, as it provides you with pack of avatars of 30-100 images at once, and a subscription is not required to use purchase packs of photos. If you've got questions about Gio, contact from the app's Settings menu >Help >Send feedback

reviews.text: REFUND!!! NOW!! I am requesting a refund because I believe that the app does not align with my expectations or needs. Unfortunately, it appears to be a misinterpretation of what was advertised or promised. I was hoping for a more intuitive and user-friendly interface, as well as features that were clearly outlined in the promotional materials. However, my experience has not reflected those claims.
reviews.replyText: Hi! Refunds can be requested via your Google Play account purchase history. We'd be grateful, if you could elaborate your thoughts about Gio's interface. You may contact us via the app's Settings menu > Help > Send feedback.

reviews.text: It's terrible if you want realistic headshots. You look exactly the same in every photo with just a different outfit on. I had a decent headshot that I wanted to improve upon and every attempt kept taking my glasses out of the picture and it was pretty much ALL the same. It's not any different than the face swap apps putting your face on different bodies/backgrounds.
reviews.replyText:
Hello!
Could you please provide us with some before&after examples at support@gioapp.ai or from the app's Settings -> Help -> Send feedback? It would be really helpful for future improvements of the app.

app.developerLegalAddress: 15 Palm Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, United States
app.recentChanges:
What’s new on GIO:
- Added new AI Avatar generation feature!
- Improved the quality of content packs for stunning results.
app.AIReview:
Overview

GIO: AI Headshot Generator is an ambitious app attempting to democratize professional headshots through generative artificial intelligence. With over 2.6 million installs and a robust 4.51 rating, it’s clear that many users find value in its core offering – generating realistic-looking headshot variations with minimal effort. The app positions itself as a ‘pocket-sized AI photo studio,’ promising professional results in seconds, eliminating the need for expensive studio bookings or complicated scheduling. It leverages GenAI to allow users to experiment with different hairstyles, outfits, and backgrounds, catering to diverse needs from LinkedIn profiles to dating app imagery. The free price point further contributes to its widespread adoption, making it an accessible solution for anyone looking to improve their digital presentation.

Key Features

GIO’s functionality revolves around several key features designed to streamline the headshot creation process:

  • AI Headshot Generation: The core feature allows users to upload a selfie or use the app's built-in camera to capture an image. The AI then generates multiple headshot variations based on user input – primarily styling choices.
  • Hairstyle Selection: Users can choose from a diverse range of hairstyles, categorized for easy browsing. The AI intelligently applies these styles to the uploaded photo, resulting in convincingly realistic transformations. Options include short cuts, long flowing hair, and various textured styles.
  • Outfit Swapping: A significant feature enabling users to instantly change their outfit within the generated headshot. The app provides a selection of clothing items ranging from business attire (suits, shirts) to casual wear, allowing for targeted styling based on the intended context.
  • Background Replacement: This allows users to replace the original background with various studio-like settings – blurred cityscapes, professional offices, or even abstract patterns. The quality of background replacement varies depending on image complexity and AI processing power.
  • Profile Customization: Users can save their favorite generated headshots, adjust lighting and color grading for finer control, and download the final images in high resolution.
  • “GIO Studio” Mode: A more advanced mode offering manual adjustments to focus, exposure, and contrast alongside the AI-powered features.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: GIO’s intuitive interface is a major strength. The process of generating headshots is remarkably simple – upload or take a photo, select desired styling elements, and instantly see the results. There's minimal learning curve involved.
  • Realistic Results (Generally): Despite being AI-generated, the headshot quality is surprisingly good in many cases. The app demonstrates a strong ability to realistically apply hairstyles and clothing items, producing believable images that can be suitable for professional use – especially with careful selection of input photos.
  • Cost-Effectiveness: Being completely free removes any financial barriers to entry. Users gain access to powerful AI features without any upfront cost.
  • Versatility: The app's adaptability caters to a broad range of users, from professionals needing LinkedIn portraits to individuals seeking enhanced dating profiles.
  • Large User Base & Positive Reviews: The high number of installs (2,631,491) and the impressive average rating (4.51/5) indicate significant user satisfaction and demonstrate a proven demand for this type of service.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Accuracy & Consistency: While generally good, the AI’s performance isn't always consistent. Complex hairstyles or detailed clothing items sometimes produce less-than-ideal results, requiring multiple iterations to achieve a satisfactory outcome. Further refinement of the AI algorithms is needed.
  • Background Replacement Limitations: The background replacement feature can struggle with intricate backgrounds – particularly those containing elements like leaves or reflections. A more robust algorithm would greatly improve its effectiveness.
  • Limited Outfit Variety: While the outfit selection isn’t bad, it could be significantly expanded to include a wider range of styles and trends, appealing to a broader demographic. Offering premium outfits via in-app purchases could also be explored.
  • Lack of Advanced Editing Tools: The “GIO Studio” mode is present but feels somewhat underdeveloped compared to dedicated photo editing apps. Adding more granular controls (curves, HSL adjustments) would enhance its appeal for users seeking a greater degree of creative control.

User Experience

The user experience within GIO is predominantly positive. The app’s clean and uncluttered interface contributes to an intuitive navigation flow. Generating headshots is remarkably fast – typically taking less than five seconds. The visual feedback provided during the styling process is clear and responsive, allowing users to quickly assess the impact of their choices. However, the app does suffer from occasional minor lag when processing images, particularly on lower-end devices. The in-app camera functionality works smoothly for capturing initial photos, although the default resolution could be higher.

Value for Money

As a free application, GIO offers exceptional value for money. It provides access to sophisticated AI technology that would typically cost hundreds of dollars if accessed through professional studios or premium editing software. The app delivers a surprisingly effective headshot creation tool without any financial commitment. While premium features (if introduced) could be monetized, the current free offering is compelling enough to justify its use for most users.

Conclusion

GIO: AI Headshot Generator represents a significant step forward in accessible digital imaging tools. Its ease of use, realistic results (when it performs well), and completely free price point make it a standout app in the photography category. While areas for improvement exist – particularly regarding AI consistency and background replacement – its strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. With ongoing development and refinement, GIO has the potential to become an indispensable tool for anyone seeking to elevate their digital presence, making professional-looking headshots readily available to a much wider audience. The app’s success demonstrates the growing power and accessibility of GenAI in creative applications.
